ygData.subject: Re: Staff of Observers
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, an observer in Steamfont (forgot her name, sorry) she talks about it.. if you want to do the quest alone without any information I won t tell you the
ygData.messageBody:
Well, an observer in Steamfont (forgot her name, sorry) she talks about it.. if
you want to do the quest alone without any information I won't tell you the
stuff she says because it wrecks the fun of the quest, but you may need good
faction with her to begin the quest..

Tion Wintermoon
Halfling Druid of the 30th Moon
Deputy of Black Moon
Master Fletcher (damn that costed me alot)
Mithaniel Marr

Gholrua Dalturak wrote:

> From: "Gholrua Dalturak" <gholrua@...>
>
> Well, let's see if we can get this list going again. I'm a level 24 druid
> on the Xegony server. I have heard alot of people talking about the Staff
> of Observers. Is this a good quest for my level? If so, where does it
> begin? I like to do all my own quests so I can know the history of the
> items I have. Please let me know where to go or who to talk to to begin
> this quest.
>
> Thanks so much,
>
> Fizzlebane Tangleroot of Rivervale
> 24th Circle Druid of Karana
> Deputy of the Great Wall Patrol
> Master Smith
> Xegony
>
